data.eml:eml: Morphology and phylogenetic analysis of two new deep-sea species of Chrysogorgia (Cnidaria, Octocorallia, Chrysogorgiidae) from Kocebu Guyot (Magellan seamounts) in the Pacific Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Yu, Li, Yang, Zhan, Zifeng, Xu, Kuidong (2019): Morphology and phylogenetic analysis of two new deep-sea species of Chrysogorgia (Cnidaria, Octocorallia, Chrysogorgiidae) from Kocebu Guyot (Magellan seamounts) in the Pacific Ocean. ZooKeys 881: 91-107, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.881.34759, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.881.34759
